description: List certifications with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can view all certifications. Non-admin users can view certifications only for certifies records they are authorized to access (per policy scope for the certifies type, including trucker/broker membership rules).
validation_notes: Status filter values map to certification statuses: editing, submitted, approved, declined, expired, archived. Filters for expires-within-days and expires-before only consider certifications with expires_at set and exclude status=expired. by-certifies expects a Type|ID string (e.g., Trucker|123). expires-before expects a YYYY-MM-DD date string; expires-within-days expects a number of days.

flags.name: --by-certifies
flags.description: Filter by certified entity (Type|ID, e.g., Trucker|123)

flags.name: --expires-within-days
flags.description: Filter by expiration within N days

flags.name: --status
flags.validation: One of: editing, submitted, approved, declined, expired, archived.
